title: Fool's Gold
description: From the author of Son of Ravage and The Holographic Detective Agency, a new novel in the tradition of the great adventure stories of the past.J.P. Linde’s Fool’s Gold is a sweeping adventure story set in the wild days of the Yukon Gold Rush, as a desperate Wyatt Earp pursues author Jack London, a boy and his scrappy terrier, and a grizzled prospector in a thrilling life-and-death race for a legendary Alaskan Gold Mine.From surviving a murderous mutiny aboard a Russian whaler to speeding down the side of a mountain atop a treacherous log flume, Jack London and his crew must stay one step ahead of a scheming dentist, his toothless henchman, and the treacherous lawman if they have any hope of reaching the golden prize alive.
author: J.P. Linde
